properties.areaDesc: Washington, AR; Carroll, AR; Madison, AR
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 10 at 5:01PM CST until January 10 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas...
Central Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas...
Northeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas...

* Until 545 PM CST.

* At 501 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located 4 miles west of Elkins, moving northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* Locations in or near the path include...
Fayetteville...                   Berryville...
Huntsville...                     Eureka Springs...
Elkins...                         Hindsville...
Wesley...                         Rudd...
Forum...                          Clifty...
Withrow Springs State Park...     Marble...
Grandview...                      Goshen...
Dryfork...                        Metalton...
Alabam...                         Pleasant Ridge...
Best...                           Sonora...
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 5:45 PM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
